record.text:
Trump’s reckless policies are increasing prices & causing economic drag. Instead of taking steps to address affordability he is:
 
A. Posting racist tropes
B. Investigating The View
C. Halting critical infrastructure projects unless cities rename things after him
✅ All of the above

images.alt: Rep. McBride speaks to members of Temple Beth El.

record.text: So great to spend the morning at Temple Beth El in Newark. I was grateful for the chance to connect with our neighbors about my first year in Congress, what’s happening in Washington, and how faith and hope sustain us in this moment.

images.alt: Rep. McBride speaks to members of Temple Beth El.

external.description: As farmers face rising costs and uncertainty tied to federal trade policy, Senator Amy Klobuchar spent Saturday morning in Mower County speaking with local farmers about their concerns over tariffs an...
external.title: Minnesota farmers urge action on trade during visit with Sen. Amy Klobuchar

record.text:
I was at Rodney and Colleen Moe’s farm in Waltham to meet with ag leaders & local farmers to discuss the challenges they’re facing, the impacts of tariffs & the need for year-round E-15. Farmers are the backbone of our economy. I’m committed to standing up for them.

www.kaaltv.com/news/top-new...

external.title: Minnesota farmers urge action on trade during visit with Sen. Amy Klobuchar

record.text: Here are 4 ways Trump is trying to undermine our fair and free elections—and why we've got to keep calling him out.

When I wrote Section 230 I did so knowing it would be critical for protecting free speech online. 30 years later and it’s one of the last things standing in the way of Republican censorship of the internet. Here’s to many more years of defending this vital safeguard of free speech.

record.text:
Kash Patel stopped FBI agents from investigating Renee Good’s killing because the findings might’ve contradicted their narrative that she was a “domestic terrorist.”

We cannot trust a word coming out of this Admin.

DHS must allow Minnesotan authorities to investigate, NOW.

record.text: John and I had a great time at Dancing with the Annunciation Stars, celebrating the resiliency of the school & raising funds for their teachers. Congrats to my former staffer extraordinaire and now Annunciation parent Kate Uding for bringing home the gold (in gold).

external.description: The Caesar Rodney and the Laurel school districts will ask their communities to approve tax increases during referendums scheduled for Monday.
external.title: Caesar Rodney, Laurel school districts seek tax increases through referendums

record.text:
Caesar Rodney and Laurel voters head to the polls Monday, 7 a.m. to 8 p.m. to decide on tax referendums to fund operating costs and retain educators. Caesar Rodney seeks $6M annually; Laurel seeks $1.6M.

What the increases would cost homeowners and why districts say they need them:

images.alt:
Screenshot of headline reading: Renee Good's partner addresses Minneapolis immigration crackdown one month after killing

Becca Good has seldom spoken out since Renee Good was shot and killed by an ICE agent in Minneapolis on Jan. 7.

record.text: “Renee was not the first person killed, and she was not the last. You know my wife’s name and you know Alex’s name, but there are many others in this city being harmed that you don’t know—their families are hurting just like mine, even if they don’t look like mine.”

record.text: As Superbowl Sunday looms—with $1.67 billion in bets expected—Americans need protection against online sports betting companies & prediction markets that exploit problem gamblers. My legislation is a start.

record.text: Last week, I demanded answers from ICE again about inhumane conditions at Burlington, following up on my oversight visit. This is no place to hold people. Accountability now.

record.text: www.newsweek.com/us-abortion-...
Reminder: Republican abortion bans have NOTHING to do with protecting women and EVERYTHING to do with controlling women’s bodies and lives.

It took the outcry of a nation to bring 5-year-old Liam Conejo Ramos and his father back to Minnesota from an ICE detention facility, and now the Trump administration is trying to fast-track their deportations.

The cruelty of this administration has no limits.
